alert.note: Alert for Lee (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 04 at 10:19AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Lee County through 1100 AM CDT... At 1018 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Deer Grove, or 11 miles south of Rock Falls, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dixon, Franklin Grove, Ashton, Harmon, Nachusa and Eldena. Including the following interstate... I-88 between mile markers 49 and 73. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
